underlying_goal: Unify version display format to match orm-discovery-mcp-go style, changing from 'go-template version v0.0.2 (date, commit)' to 'go-template v0.0.2 (commit: abc1234, built: date)'
brief_summary: User asked to implement a version display format change across multiple files using TDD, plus commit/push/PR, and Claude completed everything smoothly with CI passing.
